sections.heading: to 29-126. - Storing of moving picture films; definitions
sections.text: License to manufacture or store films. Restriction on issuance of licenses. Special room for handling films; fire extinguishers; smoking forbidden. Quantity of films under examination or repair restricted. Room to be ventilated.
